page.title: 07EDWARDIAN EXTRAVAGANZA
page.content: The Edwardian Extravaganza will be held on the 13th and 14th of July 1985,at Dunham Massey. The last Earl's father held an annual garden party,when the National Trust gained the estate they decided to carry on the tradition,and it became The Edwardian Extravaganza.At the Extravaganza there are many different stalls, most people come in Edwardian costume.The clothes are smocks for girls,sailor suits for boys,long dresses for women and trousers,shirt, boater and blazer for men. Vintage cars come and there is music from the Edwardian Age.Everybody brings a picnic.The evening ends at 10.00 with a firework display. It is an evening of nostalgia.
